effect.black_white: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 50% chance to burn the target. Frozen Pokémon may use this move, in which case they will thaw.
effect.black_2_white_2: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 50% chance to burn the target. Frozen Pokémon may use this move, in which case they will thaw.

short_effect.black_white: Has a 50% chance to burn the target. Lets frozen Pokémon thaw themselves.
short_effect.black_2_white_2: Has a 50% chance to burn the target. Lets frozen Pokémon thaw themselves.

flavor_text.black_white: The target is razed with a mystical fire of great intensity. It may also leave the target with a burn.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: The target is razed with a mystical fire of great intensity. It may also leave the target with a burn.
